programme.title: Martha Stewart's Cooking School
programme.desc: Martha demonstrates braising, the technique behind three iconic dishes: Italian specialty osso buco, traditional Irish corned beef, and lamb shanks with aromatic spices.

programme.title: Martha Stewart's Cooking School
programme.desc: Martha transforms rice from plain to extraordinary: crowd-pleasing paella, stuffed peppers, and Persian rice (rice cooked on top of thinly sliced, buttery potatoes).

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's Ultimate Home Cooking
programme.desc: Gordon proves it’s possible to make sensational food that doesn’t cost a fortune. Recipes include cinnamon eggy bread with quick stewed apples.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's Ultimate Home Cooking
programme.desc: Gordon’s Ultimate Home Cooking course continues with a flavour-packed Middle Eastern breakfast, lunch and dinner. Recipes include a twist on classic hummous made with beetroot.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's Ultimate Home Cooking
programme.desc: Gordon proves that home cooked healthy food can be as good for you as it is delicious. Recipes include steamed mussels with cherry tomatoes and pancetta for lunch.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay introduces a series of three challenges that will determine the recipients of black jackets.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The remaining chefs are challenged to create their dishes with only six ingredients.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The remaining chefs create a unique dining experience for a large group of well-known chefs.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The final two chefs prepare for their final service.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay assists a restaurant that's struggling due to the chef's incompetence and the owner's aloofness.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: To see if they've heeded his advice, Chef Ramsay checks up on three restaurants.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: The Secret Garden is a French restaurant facing bankruptcy due to ugly decor, menu and filthy kitchen.

programme.title: Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay checks in to the Juniper Hill Inn in Windsor, VT, a place that looks like a million dollars but smells of raw sewage. He meets the inn's wealthy and arrogant owner, Robert Dean II, and uncovers his shocking treatment of his staff.

programme.title: Hotel Hell
programme.desc: It's Gordon's greatest challenge to date, as he continues to uncover problem after problem at Vermont's Juniper Hill Inn. Gordon feels he has no choice but to do something he's never done before. Abandon ship.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: The chefs' trip to the Jubilee Theatre at Caesar's Palace turns into their final challenge.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: The chefs brief their teams ahead of the most important service of their lives.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: Eighteen aspiring chefs from across the country, 23 and younger, begin the competition.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: Both teams are put to the test preparing dinner for boxing legend Mike Tyson and NASCAR driver Kurt Busch.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's Ultimate Cookery Course
programme.desc: Gordon tackles stress free cooking. Recipes include sticky pork ribs, a spicy chutney and an amazing chilli chicken with ginger and coriander that just gets better and better with time.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's Ultimate Cookery Course
programme.desc: Gordon shows us how to make real fast food. Recipes include his smoky pork sliders with homemade BBQ sauce, chicken stir-fry with rice noodles, and a fast noodle soup with poached egg and spring onions.

programme.title: Positively Paula
programme.desc: Paula demonstrates creative ways to prepare three classic steaks.

programme.title: Positively Paula
programme.desc: Far from traditional, Paula teaches guest chef Jenna Kinard the path to the perfect meatball.

programme.title: Positively Paula
programme.desc: Paula crafts three unique and easy-to-make pizzas with the help of her cousin, Don.

programme.title: Martha Stewart's Cooking School
programme.desc: Martha shines the spotlight on healthful greens: sorrel soup, pasta with grilled sardines and bitter greens, Swiss chard frittata, kale Caesar salad, and spicy escarole.

programme.title: Martha Stewart's Cooking School
programme.desc: One-pot meals are the quickest way to get dinner on the table. Martha makes stovetop clambake, risotto with shrimp and herbs, poached cod with tomatoes, and arroz con pollo.

programme.title: Martha Stewart's Cooking School
programme.desc: Nothing beats a steakhouse dinner. Martha makes a classic martini, baked stuffed clams, porterhouse steak with compound butter, creamed spinach, and baked potatoes.

programme.title: Martha Stewart's Cooking School
programme.desc: Martha sheds light on the world of mushrooms with four recipes: buckwheat crepes with mushroom filling, vegetarian mushroom ragu, French mushroom soup, and mushroom risotto.

programme.title: Martha Stewart's Cooking School
programme.desc: Martha reimagines five classic sandwich recipes: roasted chicken club, po'boy, muffuletta, breakfast egg sandwich, and the Reuben.

programme.title: Martha Stewart's Cooking School
programme.desc: Turkey is not only for Thanksgiving! Martha presents roast turkey 101, roasted turkey in parchment paper, braised turkey legs, and roasted and rolled turkey breast with herbs.

programme.title: Countdown To Delicious
programme.desc: On this episode, Eddie Zamora shows you his glorious Perfect Pineapple Pork Sliders.

programme.title: Delicious Lobster Rolls
programme.desc: Five legendary cooks teach you how to make their most outrageous, delicious dishes. On this episode, Eddie Zamora shows you his insane Sweet Italian Sausage Meatballs. And Chef Tregaye teaches you how to make quick & easy Jalapeno Corn Bread... in just 1 minute.

programme.title: Countdown To Delicious
programme.desc: On this episode, Chef Lovely will dazzle you with her Hot Honey Prosciutto Flatbread Pizza.

programme.title: Countdown To Delicious
programme.desc: Five legendary cooks teach you how to make their most outrageous, delicious dishes. On this episode, Kelsey Nixon shows you her crispy, Super Cheesy Baked Ziti. And Miss Eloise teaches you how to make her chewy, simple Snickers Slice... in just 3 minutes.

programme.title: Countdown To Delicious
programme.desc: Five legendary cooks teach you how to make their most outrageous, delicious dishes. And Kelsey Nixon will teach you how to make her shocking Sheet Pan Quesadillas... in just 5 minutes and 30 seconds.

programme.title: Countdown To Delicious
programme.desc: Five legendary cooks teach you how to make their most outrageous, delicious dishes. On this episode, Eddie Zamora will shock you with his amazing Cuban Pork Nachos. And Chef Tregaye will teach you her gorgeous Banana Pudding Pancakes... in just 3 minutes.

programme.title: Positively Paula
programme.sub-title: Big Hearts, Big Smile, Big PG&J
programme.desc: Texas chef Jenna Kinard swings by to cook some Paula-style dishes and tell her inspirational story.

programme.title: Positively Paula
programme.desc: Paula shakes the pecan tree and makes a pecan pie with a traditional crust recipe.

programme.title: Positively Paula
programme.desc: Paula visits Savannah's local premiere pizza destination and becomes inspired to create a twist on breakfast.

programme.title: Martha Stewart's Cooking School
programme.desc: Martha shows how to make four vegetable dishes: steamed artichokes with tarragon butter, braised leeks, fried okra, and whole roasted garlic.

programme.title: Martha Stewart's Cooking School
programme.desc: Martha prepares grains: her mother's mushroom barley soup, couscous royale, and grits with broiled tomatoes, featuring bubbly cheddar cheese and crispy bacon.

programme.title: Martha Stewart's Cooking School
programme.desc: A great sauce can take a dish from good to fantastic. Martha shares recipes for béarnaise sauce, Kansas City barbecue sauce, tartar sauce, cocktail sauce, and salsa verde.

programme.title: Martha Stewart's Cooking School
programme.desc: There is no end to what you can make with pork. Martha makes porchetta, a holiday table-worthy glazed ham, and pork tenderloin and plums.
